byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and ELI ROSENBERG

abstract: New York City Correction Dept announces death of recruit Jessica Louis, who collapsed during physical-training exercise at Rikers Island facility.

headline.print_headline: Woman Dies in Training at Correction Academy
headline.main: Brooklyn Woman, a Correction Recruit, Dies After Collapsing During Training

snippet: Jessica Louis, 33, died during a physical-training exercise on Thursday afternoon, the Correction Department said on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Jessica Louis, 33, died during a physical-training exercise on Thursday afternoon, the Correction Department said on Friday.
